props.avatar: Removes badge padding for the use of the `BadgeContent` in the badge slot.
props.bordered: Applies a 2px by default and 1.5px border around the badge when using the `Dot` propert
props.content: Any content you want injected as text into the badge.
props.dot: Reduce the size of the badge and hide its contents
props.icon: Designates a specific icon used in the badge.
props.inline: Moves the badge to be inline with the wrapping element. Supports the usage of the `Left` prop.
props.offsetX: Offset the badge on the x-axis.
props.offsetY: Offset the badge on the y-axis.
props.overLap: Overlaps the slotted content on top of the component.
props.value: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.
